title: Are Barnes and Noble stores closing? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to cursory research, Barnes and Nobel was already in a tough spot in 2019, having been sold to a hedge fund as a last ditch effort to turn the business around and make it profitable again. At the end of March 2020 it temporarily closed around 400 locations, over half the chain, due to COVID-19. It’s looking grim.
